Hi

I am going to join Nate and Tony on this

I have taken to deleteing messages by subject due to
the crap that was in them and not even reading them.

can we please keep the information we share to
Japanese history and related subjects please

Paul


--- Nate Ledbetter <ltdomer98@...> wrote:

---------------------------------
Here here~!!!

I go to the field for 11 days, come back, and there
are 88 messages from this board alone on mainly
inane crap. 

Go somewhere else to talk about that stuff. Thanks.

Nate


--- "Anthony J. Bryant" <ajbryant@...> wrote:
> Carlo Tacchini wrote:
> 
> > B2B is the latest type of U.S. stealth long-range
> bomber and the Merkava
> > is the standard israeli battle tank.
> 
> Okay, this has gone far enough.
> 
> I formally request that the moderator step in and
> put an end to this now by
> whatever means necessary, be it putting some posters
> on moderated status or
> locking out.
> 
> This is really too much.
> 
> Tony
> 
>
